column1: Uchi////while in texas for a business trip
column2: a coworker told us that this place's omakase was good
column3: so we decided to stop by after a few drinks in downtown houston. when we first got there
column4: we thought we could walk in without making reservations and get seated. Â welp
column5: that idea backfired big time... there was a long wait
column6: but luckily we were able to grab drinks at the bar to allow time to pass.
